meanings.definition: A person who believes in the literal interpretation of the biblical account of creation.
meanings.sent1: Many creationists attend church regularly to learn more about their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Some creationists study the Bible to understand the story of creation better.
meanings.sent3: The creationists in the debate club had a lively discussion about the origin of the universe.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, creationists stood firm in their belief in a divine creator.
meanings.sent5: The group of creationists gathered to discuss their shared faith in the biblical creation story.

meanings.definition: Those who reject the theory of evolution in favor of a belief in divine creation.
meanings.sent1: Creationists often question the evidence presented for the theory of evolution.
meanings.sent2: The debate between creationists and evolutionists continues to spark controversy.
meanings.sent3: During the science fair, the creationists presented their alternative views on the origin of species.
meanings.sent4: The creationists' belief in divine creation stood in contrast to the scientific theory of evolution.
meanings.sent5: In the museum, creationists admired the exhibits that supported their beliefs in biblical creation.
